column4: all I can tell you about the intel, onboard things is that if you happen to have the 915 chipset, you get good graphics when trying to put Mac OS x86 on a PC
I am on a mission to make Linux look and feel like Windows XP
when you're finished with reza, may I ask if you are using ubuntu or kubuntu?
I use Ubuntu, but I use it with gnome AND kde
if you want to convince your dad; use gnome, is quite simple, kde have too much programs
